ABOUT.TITLE: About This App
ABOUT.COURSE_INFO: as part of the Specialization Course: Developing Mobile Applications. The project was completed under the guidance and supervision of
ABOUT.PROJECT_DESCRIPTION: The app was developed between November - December 2024 as a part of our academic endeavor to create a user-friendly travel diary platform. It aims to help users track their travel experiences, document memories, and explore destinations with an interactive map interface.
ABOUT.USER_EXPERIENCE: We hope this app enhances your journey by allowing you to easily store and relive your travel memories, while providing a seamless experience to track your past adventures.
ABOUT.COPYRIGHT_INFO: © 2024 Mohd Rayyan Shaikh & Ayesha Ahmed Dhool. All rights reserved.
ABOUT.OWNERSHIP_INFO: This app and its contents are the property of Mohd Rayyan Shaikh & Ayesha Ahmed Dhool. Unauthorized reproduction or distribution of any part of this app is prohibited. All trademarks, service marks, and logos are the property of their respective owners.
